official_title: A Single-arm Phase II Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Combination Systematic Chemotherapy and Multiple Rounds of Endoscopic Ultrasound-guided Radiofrequency Ablation in Pancreatic Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosed and histologically-confirmed PDAC by biopsy
* Permanent street address
* Consent to study participation
* Axial CT scan consistent with PDAC
* No prior chemotherapy or less than 2 months of pre-operative chemotherapy for PDAC
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0-2
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Male or female patients < 18 years of age
* No permanent street address or telephone number
* Pregnant patients
* Inmates or prisoners
* Unable to provide informed consent
